title.rendered: Little Lions PreSchool Martial Arts for Kids in Lakeland Florida

content.rendered:
Little Lions Preschool Martial Arts

Ages 3-5+

You can never start learning respect, focus and confidence too early! Our Little Lions preschool martial arts classes help instill admiration for family and friends, discipline and hard work. These are qualities that can last them a life time. As we lay the basic foundations of Kung Fu and Kickboxing in fun little kids martial arts classes. Each class has parent involvement and is a fun activity that you can enjoy with your preschooler. Having fun while learning valuable life lessons and self-defense skills. What our classes offer:

– Fun and engaging exercises and movements
– Moms and Dads are encouraged to participate!
– Teaches importance of chores, discipline, & honoring parents at home
– Available to children ages 3-6 years old every Saturdays morning
– Basic self defense techniques and fine motor skills
– Boosts confidence and self esteem
– Foundations of kickboxing and kung fu

Book a Two Week Studio Trial

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

A Martial Arts Program for Preschoolers

We’ll help you and your kids develop character, discipline, self-control, and other valuable life skills. Along the way, they’ll learn the basics of self-defense techniques that we can continue to build upon as they grow older. If you’re looking to find a family-friendly preschool martial arts program in Lakeland Florida, there’s no better place to look. The Sifu Och kids martial arts program in lakeland teaches critical life skills while providing plenty of exercise and boosting each child’s confidence and self-esteem.

About the Studio

“The Instructors are great. When my 4yo first started coming here he cried so much and had no interest in participating with the class. The teachers were always patient and talked him through it. He loves his class now and always looks forward to going!”

— Ashely V.,

(Parent of Kid’s Class Student)

Parent & Child Martial Arts Classes to Build Self Confidence!

The Sifu Och Wing Chun Little Lions preschool martial arts program is taught personally by internationally-trained Wing Chun kung fu instructor Sifu Justin Och. Classes are held on Saturday mornings at 9 am. This is a “Mommy and Me” or “Daddy and Me” program that’s perfect for giving you something that’s both fun and healthy for you and your child!

Get Started Now with a 2 Week Trial!

Testimonials

Kayla D.

(Kid’s Classes)

I highly recommend this place! Both my 11 year olds go here. One for kickboxing and one for kids martial arts. My son has high functioning autism and ADHD…

(Kid’s Classes)

The Instructors are great. When my 4yo first started coming here he cried so much and had no interest in participating with the class. The teachers were always patient…

(Kid’s Classes)

The thing that has meant the most to me in Wing Chun is defending myself and making new friends. I love Wing Chun and I think I have improved…

(Kid’s Classes)

This is by far one of the best summer camp and after school programs in lakeland florida, we have tried almost every martial art program in lakeland and have…

Alice H.

(Kid’s Classes)

Grades up, Chores done, actually listening, oh this is a parents dream. Thank you Sifu Och your Wing Chun Kung Fu is exactly what we needed, I am soooo…

Jacob E.

(Kid’s Classes)

My boys needed more than what their school had in a afterschool program, I wanted a program that had the best for them, kept on top of them and…

Alexis D.

(Kid’s Classes)

I had my daughter in a “generic” afterschool care program when she first started Kindergarten, after a while I decided to make a wise decision to change her to…

Jackson

(Kid’s Classes)

Two polk county police officers sign up their child. We needed focus, concentration and an increase in discipline and respect instilled into our son. As parent’s we…

Dylan

(Kid’s Classes)

Our son has been going to Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu afterschool martial arts program for 2 years now and we have seen a remarkable improvement in his…
See all

Creating the Building Blocks for Discipline and Focus

Our classes create confident preschoolers who develop their focusing skills. Behind the Wing Chun Little Lions preschool martial arts program is the principle of personal protection. Even at this phase we’re instilling self confidence and basic skills to help your children think through situations instead of using their fists first.

Our Sifu Och Wing Chun school in Lakeland Florida was the first and original preschool martial arts class.  A Fun and great place where you’ll be able to train with your child. We teach them skills that can transfer right into our kids martial arts classes—and eventually, our adult Wing Chun classes. This allows them to seamlessly make the move from teen student to adult practitioner without missing a step. In fact, we’re teaching your kids the very same techniques that we teach our adult Wing Chun students, just customized to be a better fit for their age, development level, and physical abilities.

“They have even helped me because when I felt like giving up and not coming back they encouraged me and helped me in any way they could to help my daughter break out of her shell. My daughter’s behavior has improved tremendously!”

— Natasha R.,

(Parent of Little Lions Class Student)

Take a look into what are classes are like!

We focus on real-world results while encouraging kids, adults, families, and individuals through both group and private lessons. Dedicated students interested in learning the entire system of Wing Chun Kung Fu, self defense, cardio kickboxing, kids martial arts, after school pickup programs, and no-gi Jiujitsu are welcome to join any one of our many programs. We are one big martial arts family—training, socializing, and making friends of all ages.

Start now by signing up to our two week training trial with the form below!
